plot: Free adaptation of Hans Christian Andersen's stories, introduced and told by Chianti and Zucco.
opening_theme: "Mr. Andersen" by Taeko Sakurai with Young Fresh
ending_theme: "Chianti no Uta (Chianti's Song)" by Eiko Masuyama with Young Fresh
"Zucco no Uta (Zucco's Song)" by Yasuo Yamada with Young Fresh
